metadata.title: Early Spread of SARS-Cov-2 in the Icelandic Population

abstract.original_text: Limited data exist on how SARS-CoV-2 enters and spreads in the general population.

sentences.segment_text: Limited data exist on how SARS-CoV-2 enters and spreads in the general population .

abstract.original_text: We used two strategies for SARS-CoV-2 testing: targeted testing of high-risk individuals (n=4,551) and a population screening (n=5,502). We sequenced SARS-CoV-2 from 340 individuals.

sentences.segment_text: We used two strategies for SARS-CoV-2 testing : targeted testing of high-risk individuals ( n = 4,551 ) and a population screening ( n = 5,502 ) .

abstract.original_text: March 22 2020, 528 had tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 in the targeted testing (11.6%) and 50 in the population screening (0.9%); approximately 0.2% of the Icelandic population. Large fractions of positives had travelled outside Iceland (38.4% and 34.0%). Fewer under 10 years old were positive than those older: 2.8% vs. 12.3%

sentences.segment_text: March 22 2020 , 528 had tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 in the targeted testing ( 11.6 % ) and 50 in the population screening ( 0.9 % ) ; approximately 0.2 % of the Icelandic population .
Large fractions of positives had travelled outside Iceland ( 38.4 % and 34.0 % ) .
Fewer under 10 years old were positive than those older : 2.8 % vs. 12.3 %

abstract.original_text: for targeted testing (P=1.6e-9) and 0.0% vs. 1.0% for population screening (P=0.031).

sentences.segment_text: for targeted testing ( P = 1.6e-9 ) and 0.0 % vs. 1.0 % for population screening ( P = 0.031 ) .

abstract.original_text: Fewer females were positive in the targeted testing than males (9.5% vs. 14.6%, P=6.8e-9). SARS-CoV-2 came from eight clades, seven A clades and one B clade. The clade composition differed between the testing groups and changed with time. In the early targeted testing, 65.0% of clades were A2a1 and A2a2 derived from Italian and Austrian skiing areas, but in the later targeted testing went down to 30.6% and were overtaken by A1a and A2a, the most common clades in the population screening.

sentences.segment_text: Fewer females were positive in the targeted testing than males ( 9.5 % vs. 14.6 % , P = 6.8e-9 ) .
seven A clades and one B clade .
The clade composition differed between the testing groups and changed with time .

but in the later targeted testing went down to 30.6 % and were overtaken by A1a and A2a ,
the most common clades in the population screening .

abstract.original_text: SARS-CoV-2 has spread widely in Iceland outside of the high-risk groups. Several strains cause these infections and their relative contribution changed rapidly.

sentences.segment_text: SARS-CoV-2 has spread widely in Iceland outside of the high-risk groups .
Several strains cause these infections and their relative contribution changed rapidly .
